sweeping-piles.task-description: Push piles of small objects into a target goal zone marked on the tabletop.

place-red-in-green.task-description: pick up the red blocks and place them into the green bowls amidst other objects.

align-box-corner.task-description: pick up the randomly sized box and align one of its corners to the L-shaped marker on the tabletop..

stack-block-pyramid.task-description: sequentially stack 6 blocks into a pyramid of 3-2-1 with rainbow colored ordering.

palletizing-boxes.task-description: pick up homogeneous fixed-sized boxes and stack them in transposed layers on the pallet.

assembling-kits.task-description: pick up different objects and arrange them on a board marked with corresponding silhouettes.

packing-boxes.task-description: pick up randomly sized boxes and place them tightly into a container.

sweeping-piles.task-description: push piles of small objects into a target goal zone marked on the tabletop.

manipulating-rope.task-description: rearrange a deformable rope such that it connects the two endpoints of a 3-sided square.

align-rope.task-description: manipulate a deformable rope to connect its end-points between two corners of a 3-sided square.
